contact.testimonial1Text: Kelme Studio delivered an exceptional design that truly captured the essence of our brand. The team was professional from start to finish and understood exactly what we wanted.
contact.testimonial2Text: Working with the Kelme team was an incredible experience. They not only met the deadline but exceeded our expectations with creative ideas and innovative solutions.
contact.testimonial3Text: The dedication and attention to detail from the Kelme Studio team was impressive. They transformed our vision into reality and created a website that truly represents our brand.
contact.faqDescription: Answers to the most common questions about our services and work process.
contact.faq1Question: What services does Kelme Studio offer?
contact.faq1Answer: We offer a full range of digital services, including website and app development, UI/UX design, branding, digital marketing, and content strategy. Our goal is to create digital solutions that help drive your business forward.
contact.faq2Question: How does the work process function?
contact.faq2Answer: Our process begins with an initial consultation to understand your needs. We then develop a customized strategic plan, followed by phases of design, development, testing, and launch. We maintain clear and transparent communication throughout the project.
contact.faq3Question: How long does it take to complete a project?
contact.faq3Answer: Completion time varies according to the complexity and scope of the project. A simple website can take a few weeks, while more complex projects may take several months. We provide a detailed time estimate after our initial consultation.
contact.faq4Answer: Cost is based on the complexity, scope, and timeline of the project. Factors such as number of pages, custom features, exclusive design, and system integrations affect the price. We offer a transparent and detailed quote after our initial consultation.
contact.faq5Question: Do you offer support after launch?
contact.faq5Answer: Yes, we offer ongoing support and maintenance packages after launch. This includes security updates, bug fixes, minor improvements, and performance monitoring to ensure your project continues to run smoothly.
